content:
Hello, in rustc-dev-guide there is a mention that all source files should not have header with the copyright notice. However, I have found some and according to this section they should be removed.

From a quick ripgrep it looks like there is this file and some other with Public Domain copyright (should these copyrights be removed as well?) : for example here

I know this might be a fringe issue, but striving for coherency is something a good repository should aim for :)
The dev guide is probably right on the subject so you can either open an issue about it or if you have the time and will, a PR :smile:
(realized my comment was out of context :face_palm: )

It looks like these copyrights have to stay right now (they cannot be removed if they are not subject to the general licensing terms). I submitted a PR but it was closed. Sometime in the future then :)
